ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Here's one for the list to answer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Like it or not, the game is now largely composed of casters, so I guess they will be getting the most attention. It s a catch 22 really. Just like rogues
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Mar 23/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> No its not that I want to complain that now they can chain cast buffs. I'm
> more irritated in that I think there are things far more 'broken' for other
> classes and that they should spend their time on finding way to tweak the
> non-purecasting classes to make them better as they are already behind. Why
> on earth would Necros need any enhancement whatsoever at this point???

Like it or not, the game is now largely composed of casters, so I guess
they will be getting the most attention. It's a catch 22 really. Just
like rogues will never get "fixed" because hardly anyone plays them.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
